list.name: Default
list.comment: Fixed multiple bugs concerning multiple starts of apps.

task.summary: started stopwatch and fixed GPIO, hopefully
started stopwatch and fixed GPIO, hopefully
WATERPROOF IS BACK BITCHES (and btw, there's transparency, spacing for lists and some "unimportant" optimizations)
SNAKE IS PLAYABLE and a new constants file with some colors
Minesweeper is work in progress, added GREY to colors

I'll be happy forever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever...
